if you want to make totally sure to preserve everything, do cp -aL
-a means copy everything, -L means follow all symlinks
you could also do "dd if=/dev/osxpartition_name of=~/diskimage.img
for snapshot

not an iso, but a disk image. well, they're basically the same thing. dd basically recreates the whole disk, byte for byte, in a file
